title: The Best 58 AI Transcription Tools in 2025
summary: Unlock the power of AI Transcription tools to effortlessly convert audio and video content into accurate, searchable text. Designed for professionals, students, and content creators, these innovative solutions save you time, enhance productivity, and improve accessibility. With features like real-time transcription, multi-language support, and easy integration, you can streamline your workflow and focus on what truly matters. Explore our curated selection of AI Transcription tools today and transform the way you manage your audio content!

tools.name: Clipto
tools.description: Clipto is an AI-powered platform for transcription, video editing, and digital asset management, designed to streamline content creation.

tools.name: Notta
tools.description: Notta is an AI-powered transcription and note-taking platform that converts audio and video into text with real-time collaboration features.

tools.name: ScreenApp
tools.description: ScreenApp is a versatile screen recording and video editing platform designed to simplify content creation and collaboration.

tools.name: Freed
tools.description: Freed is an AI-powered medical scribe that automates clinical documentation to save clinicians time.

tools.name: Vatis Tech
tools.description: Vatis Tech provides AI-powered speech-to-text technology for accurate and efficient transcription of audio and video data.

tools.name: Krisp
tools.description: Krisp is an AI-powered platform that enhances online meetings by removing background noise, transcribing, and summarizing conversations for improved productivity.

tools.name: Submagic
tools.description: Submagic is an AI-powered platform that creates captivating short-form videos with dynamic captions, B-rolls, and smart edits to boost social media engagement.

tools.name: Kome
tools.description: Kome is an AI-powered browser extension that enhances online productivity by summarizing content, managing bookmarks, and assisting with content creation.

tools.name: Deepgram
tools.description: Deepgram provides advanced AI-powered speech-to-text, text-to-speech, and voice agent solutions for enterprise voice applications.

tools.name: Podcastle

tools.name: Sonix

tools.name: Inner AI
tools.description: Inner AI is a platform that leverages artificial intelligence to organize thoughts, enhance creativity, and streamline task completion.

tools.name: Cleanvoice AI

tools.name: Mindgrasp
tools.description: Mindgrasp is an AI-powered learning platform that transforms educational content into personalized study tools for students and professionals.

tools.name: AssemblyAI
tools.description: AssemblyAI provides advanced Speech AI models to transcribe and analyze voice data via a developer-friendly API.

tools.name: Luzia
tools.description: Luzia is an AI-powered virtual assistant that simplifies daily tasks and enhances productivity through natural conversation.

tools.name: DupDub

tools.name: Salad

tools.name: Eightify

tools.name: Limitless

tools.name: Tella

tools.name: Gladia

tools.name: Bluedot

tools.name: Coral AI

tools.name: Gling

tools.name: MeetGeek

tools.name: Castmagic

tools.description: Whisper Transcribe is an online platform that uses AI to transcribe audio and video files into text with high accuracy and support for multiple languages.

tools.name: Claap

tools.name: Ringflow

tools.name: RightBlogger

tools.name: Snipd

tools.description: Avoma is an all-in-one AI platform that automates note-taking, scheduling, coaching, and revenue intelligence to enhance business efficiency and growth.

tools.name: Rev.ai
tools.description: Rev.ai provides an API for highly accurate speech-to-text transcription and additional insights for audio and video files, catering to applications needing transcription, language identification, sentiment analysis, and more.

tools.name: AutoCaption

tools.description: Circleback is an AI-powered meeting assistant that automatically transcribes, summarizes, and organizes notes from virtual meetings to enhance productivity.

tools.name: Biography Studio AI

tools.name: WriteVoice
tools.description: WriteVoice is an AI-powered voice-to-text tool that allows users to write faster by speaking instead of typing, integrating seamlessly with various applications.

tools.description: TranscriptGenerator.ai provides AI-powered transcription for Instagram videos, offering fast, accurate text with timestamps and multilingual support.
